attributes.action: Outlaw pornagraphical material produced without condoms
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current rensaissance of 'Bareback' Pornography is a disgrace to our times, with the needless current ressurgances of HIV and other STI infections coming about in the field.
Sadly filmers in this area often now offer only work in unprotected work in these areas, and as highlited in a recent Newsnight report, this can lead to tradgic results.
The workers in this area, often deprived and disadvantaged, deserve full legal coverage in protection from such terrible,needless, ailments with simple measures like obligitary condom use.

This may be an industry ideal to ignore, but we can and should not ignore the people who suffer from working in it's needlessly careless environment.
